about_the_game:
In the stellar vacuum of the future, mechanical rebellion threatens humanity. Join the Android Resistance and fight for freedom!

Get ready for an epic showdown against rebel machines in Android Resistance, a frenetic top-down shooter that challenges your skills and strategy. Take on the role of Adrian-317, the wise Vanguard, and assemble a diverse team of androids, each with their unique abilities.

Frenetic Action: Face hordes of enemies in intense battles where survival is the only option. Shoot, dodge, and evade enemy attacks to emerge victorious.

Variety of Characters: Choose from a range of specialized androids, from the optimistic Alpha-101 to the courageous warrior Sara-977. Each character offers a unique gaming experience, allowing you to choose your combat style.

Strategic Challenges: Take on powerful bosses, explore dynamic levels, and collect points to unlock new upgrades, characters, and game modes. Your choices determine the fate of the galaxy.

Get ready for battle! Join the Android Resistance and fight for humanity's freedom against the rebel machines. The future of the galaxy depends on you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
